title: Rough Tackle
description: Librarian's Note: this is an alternate cover edition - ASIN: B010Y6AZQIDr Lauren Hopper-Lowe, attractive and domineering sports practitioner at Belmont Rugby Club, has more than one secret to keep. Trapped in a marriage of convenience, her dangerous sexual liaisons with a naïve young college student and an older, wealthy and powerful man threaten to derail the psychological stability she fights so hard to maintain. Modest sports superstar, Toby Cutler, hero of Belmont and England, struggles to break free from the shackles of an identity crisis and an unlikely relationship that is endangering his public persona. Desperate to find meaning in life, outside his career and his aristocratic background, he is vulnerable to the exploitation of others. Driven to extreme jealousy through her desire for Toby, Lauren initiates a sequence of uncontrollable events destined to destroy the careers of all those around her. Can the balance of power between them be redressed before it’s too late?
author: Nikola Perkatis
